ID: 49439
Title: query report "runtime error: slice bounds out of range"
Description:
## Bug Report

Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

### 1. Minimal reproduce step (Required)
``` SQL
CREATE TABLE `tbb636885` (
  `col_52` enum('Alice','Bob','Charlie','David') DEFAULT NULL,
  `col_53` decimal(32,10) DEFAULT '3498',
  `col_54` json NOT NULL,
  `col_55` json NOT NULL,
  `col_56` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '2005-12-25 00:00:00',
  `col_57` json NOT NULL,
  `col_58` varchar(347) CHARACTER SET gbk COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci DEFAULT '惕4Ix%~Lvf',
  KEY `idx_36` (`col_58`(2),(cast(`col_55` as signed array)),`col_56`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;
insert ignore into tbb636885 set col_52 = 'David', col_53 = 9446, col_54 = "[-188970.04845183485,43781.61761770088,69361.79170053807,-13306.813895887602,-58544.62746628815,-341214.5896316508,-102224.14701130857,-144266.0524360935,-12736.240738057286,-44056.27760526228,-76136.99493585415,-34560.558247775494,5950.352545134869,-34645.2368389399,23148.02824165915,29649.47422278108,-1423283.9295774647,-62921.81223954833,37101.0766034327,-261692.25837837838,-51842.865990669336,417974.0910359261,-102564.18942463533]", col_55 = "[-1880173730,-1000131744,-1867034847,-325214208,-1972370329,1888292314,950843668,1806979629,299838783,-1777852652,-1705021856,259717308,2017726091,-810172407]", col_56 = '2032-04-04', col_57 = "[-238683771,-223470964,1638163240,-1400458595,2030454655,92316192,-1736863773,-161294550,543566009,118521703,-1396008214,747609387,641740972,-1422347200,-511594859,-87966369,484541748,-322969235,808930874,-598001760,-237520912,1967749997,616899129,-1354120164,-1885203009,549563856,187404831,-55479645,-935992689,-241991340,938413209]", col_58 = "镲显y昦r" ;
```
